head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HUGHES, THOMAS F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HUGHES, THOMAS F.

block.p: HUGHES--Thomas F., 87, of Greens Farms, CT, died on Saturday, April 7, 2007. Survived by three children; Beth, Laurie, and Tim, and grandson, Jesse. Services will be held on Saturday, April 14, 2007, at 3:30 PM at The First Congregational Church, corner of Park and Lewis Streets, Norwalk, CT. Visitation Friday, April 13, 2007, from 6-8 PM in the Spear-Miller Funeral Home, 39 South Benson Rd, Fairfield, CT.
